mapper.select: SELECT A.ADOC_NO, A.ADOC_NAME, A.ADOC_CONTENT, A.EMP_NO, TO_CHAR(A.DRAFT_DATE,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일') AS DRAFT_DATE , A.NOELEC_STATUS,D.APPROVE_NO, D.APPROVE_STATUS,TO_CHAR(D.APPROVE_DATE,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일') AS APPROVE_DATE, D.EMP_NO AS APPROVE_MEMBER FROM APPROVEDOCUMENT A JOIN DOCAPPROVE D ON A.ADOC_NO = D.ADOC_NO WHERE A.ADOC_NO=#{adocNo} AND APPROVE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(A.ADOC_NO) FROM APPROVEDOCUMENT A JOIN DOCAPPROVE D ON A.ADOC_NO = D.ADOC_NO WHERE A.EMP_NO=#{empNo} AND APPROVE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT A.ADOC_NAME,C.NO AS CONT_NO ,TO_CHAR(C.END_DATE,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') AS CONT_END_DATE ,C.RANGE,TO_CHAR(C.ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') AS CONT_ENROLL_DATE,C.STATUS AS CONT_STATUS, C.ADOC_NO FROM DOC_CONTROL C JOIN APPROVEDOCUMENT A ON C.ADOC_NO = A.ADOC_NO WHERE A.EMP_NO =#{map.empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE DOC_CONTROL SET STATUS = #{contStatus} WHERE ADOC_NO = #{adocNo}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(D.ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일') AS CONT_ENROLL_DATE , TO_CHAR(D.END_DATE,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일') AS CONT_END_DATE , RANGE , D.STATUS AS CONT_STATUS , Z.* FROM DOC_CONTROL D JOIN (SELECT D.*,APPROVE_NO, APPROVE_STATUS, APPROVE_DATE,APPROVE_MEMBER FROM (SELECT ADOC_NO, A.ADOC_NAME, A.ADOC_CONTENT, A.EMP_NO ,TO_CHAR(A.DRAFT_DATE,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일') AS DRAFT_DATE, A.NOELEC_STATUS,E.EMP_NAME FROM APPROVEDOCUMENT A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) D JOIN (SELECT APPROVE_NO,ADOC_NO,APPROVE_STATUS, TO_CHAR(APPROVE_DATE,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일')AS APPROVE_DATE, E.EMP_NAME AS APPROVE_MEMBER, D.EMP_NO FROM DOCAPPROVE D JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON D.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) O ON D.ADOC_NO = #{adocNo}) Z ON D.ADOC_NO = Z.ADOC_NO

SELECT TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') AS CONT_ENROLL_DATE ,TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') AS CONT_END_DATE , RANGE, STATUS, D.ADOC_NO ,ADOC_NAME FROM DOC_CONTROL D JOIN APPROVEDOCUMENT A ON D.ADOC_NO = A.ADOC_NO WHERE D.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT SIGN_EDIT FROM SIGNFILE S JOIN DOCAPPROVE D ON D.EMP_NO = S.EMP_NO WHERE APPROVE_NO = #{approvNo}

SELECT A.EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, DEPT_NAME , POS_NAME FROM (SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, E.DEPT_NO,POS_NO ,D.DEPT_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) A JOIN POSITION P ON A.POS_NO = P.POS_NO WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
